title: Bicombing the mapping class group and Teichmüller space via stable cubical intervals
summary: In this mostly expository article, we provide a new account of our proof with Minsky and Sisto that mapping class groups and Teichmüller spaces admit bicombings. More generally, we explain how the hierarchical hull of a pair of points in any colorable hierarchically hyperbolic space is quasi-isometric to a finite CAT(0) cube complex of bounded dimension, with the added property that perturbing the pair of points results in a uniformly bounded change to the cubical structure. Our approach is simplified and new in many aspects.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种简化的新方法来证明映射类群和Teichmüller空间具有双梳状结构，并推广到任意可着色分层双曲空间中的分层壳与有限维CAT(0)立方复形拟等距。
AI.motivation: 本文旨在提供一种简化且新颖的方法来解释作者与Minsky和Sisto之前关于映射类群和Teichmüller空间具有双梳状结构的证明，并将这一结果推广到更一般的分层双曲空间框架中。
AI.method: 采用分层双曲空间的框架，证明对于任意可着色分层双曲空间中的点对，其分层壳与有限维有界维数的CAT(0)立方复形拟等距，且具有扰动稳定性：点对的微小扰动仅导致立方结构的有限变化。
AI.result: 证明了映射类群和Teichmüller空间具有双梳状结构，并建立了更一般的结果：任意可着色分层双曲空间中点对的分层壳与有限维CAT(0)立方复形拟等距，且该对应具有扰动稳定性。
AI.conclusion: 本文提供了一种简化且新颖的方法，不仅重新解释了映射类群和Teichmüller空间的双梳状结构证明，还将这一结果推广到分层双曲空间的更一般框架中，展示了分层壳与CAT(0)立方复形之间的稳定拟等距关系。

title: Instanton 2-torsion and fibered knots
summary: We prove that the unreduced singular instanton homology $I^\sharp(Y,K;\mathbb{Z})$ has $2$-torsion for any null-homologous fibered knot $K$ of genus $g>0$ in a closed $3$-manifold $Y$ except for $\#^{2g}S^1\times S^2$. The main technical result is a formula of $I^\sharp(Y,K;\mathbb{C})$ via sutured instanton theory, by which we can compare the dimensions of $I^\sharp(Y,K;\mathbb{F}_2)$ and $I^\sharp(Y,K;\mathbb{C})$. As a byproduct, we show that $I^\sharp(S^3,K;\mathbb{C})$ for a knot $K\subset S^3$ admitting lens space surgeries is determined by the Alexander polynomial, while some special cases of torus knots have been previously studied by many people. Another byproduct is that the next-to-top Alexander grading summand of instanton knot homology $KHI(S^3,K,g(K)-1)$ is non-vanishing when $K$ has unknotting number one, which generalizes the Baldwin--Sivek's result in the fibered case. Finally, we discuss the relation to the Heegaard Floer theory.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了对于任何亏格g>0的零同调纤维结K，除了#^{2g}S^1×S^2情况外，其未约化奇异瞬子同调I^♯(Y,K;ℤ)都存在2-挠元。
AI.motivation: 研究奇异瞬子同调的挠元性质，特别是2-挠元的存在性，这对于理解瞬子同调与Heegaard Floer理论之间的关系具有重要意义。
AI.method: 通过缝合瞬子理论建立了I^♯(Y,K;ℂ)的计算公式，通过比较I^♯(Y,K;𝔽₂)和I^♯(Y,K;ℂ)的维数来证明2-挠元的存在性。
AI.result: 证明了对于任何亏格g>0的零同调纤维结K（除了#^{2g}S^1×S^2），其未约化奇异瞬子同调都存在2-挠元；对于允许透镜空间手术的S^3中的结，其I^♯(S^3,K;ℂ)由Alexander多项式决定；对于解结数为1的结，其瞬子结同调的次高Alexander分次分量非零。
AI.conclusion: 该研究揭示了奇异瞬子同调中2-挠元的普遍存在性，建立了瞬子理论与Heegaard Floer理论之间的新联系，并推广了先前关于特殊结的结果。

title: Property (T) and Poincaré duality in dimension three
summary: We use a recent result of Bader and Sauer on coboundary expansion to prove residually finite three-dimensional Poincaré duality groups never have property (T). This implies such groups are never Kähler. The argument applies to fundamental groups of (possibly non-aspherical) compact 3-manifolds, giving a new proof of a theorem of Fujiwara that states if the fundamental group of a compact 3-manifold has property (T), then that group is finite. The only consequence of geometrization needed in the proof is that 3-manifold groups are residually finite.

AI.tldr: 利用Bader和Sauer关于上边缘扩张的结果，证明三维庞加莱对偶群不可能有性质(T)，从而这类群不可能是Kähler群。该论证也适用于三维流形基本群，为藤原定理提供了新证明。
AI.motivation: 研究三维庞加莱对偶群的性质(T)问题，特别是三维流形基本群的性质(T)存在性。性质(T)是几何群论中的重要性质，与Kähler群结构有密切关系。
AI.method: 利用Bader和Sauer关于上边缘扩张的最新结果，结合三维庞加莱对偶群的结构特性。证明过程仅需几何化定理的一个推论：三维流形群是剩余有限群。
AI.result: 证明剩余有限的三维庞加莱对偶群不可能有性质(T)，因此这类群不可能是Kähler群。该结果也给出了藤原定理的新证明：如果紧致三维流形的基本群具有性质(T)，则该群必为有限群。
AI.conclusion: 三维庞加莱对偶群与性质(T)不相容，这为理解三维流形基本群的代数性质提供了新视角，并建立了与Kähler群理论的联系。

title: On $GL(1|1)$ Higgs bundles
summary: We investigate the moduli space of holomorphic $GL(1|1)$ Higgs bundles over a compact Riemann surface. The supergroup $GL(1|1)$, the simplest non-trivial example beyond abelian cases, provides an ideal setting for developing supergeometric analogues of classical results in Higgs bundle theory. We derive an explicit description of the moduli space and we study the analogue of the Narasimhan-Seshadri theorem as well as the nonabelian Hodge correspondence. Furthermore, we formulate and solve the corresponding Hitchin equations, demonstrating their compatibility with fermionic contributions. As a highlight, we discuss the related Hitchin system on $\mathbb{P}^1$ and its integrability.

AI.tldr: 研究紧致黎曼曲面上GL(1|1)超群希格斯丛的模空间，建立超几何版本的Narasimhan-Seshadri定理和非阿贝尔Hodge对应，求解Hitchin方程并讨论其在ℙ¹上的可积系统。
AI.motivation: GL(1|1)是最简单的非平凡超群（超越阿贝尔情形），为发展希格斯丛理论的超几何类比提供了理想框架。通过研究其模空间，可以建立超几何版本的经典结果，包括Narasimhan-Seshadri定理和非阿贝尔Hodge对应。
AI.method: 推导GL(1|1)希格斯丛模空间的显式描述；研究超几何版本的Narasimhan-Seshadri定理和非阿贝尔Hodge对应；构造并求解相应的Hitchin方程，证明其与费米子贡献的相容性；特别讨论ℙ¹上的相关Hitchin系统及其可积性。
AI.result: 获得了GL(1|1)希格斯丛模空间的显式描述；建立了超几何版本的Narasimhan-Seshadri定理和非阿贝尔Hodge对应；成功求解了Hitchin方程并证明了其与费米子贡献的相容性；在ℙ¹上构造了可积的Hitchin系统。
AI.conclusion: 该工作为超几何希格斯丛理论建立了基础框架，将经典结果推广到超群情形，特别是为最简单的非平凡超群GL(1|1)提供了完整的理论描述，包括模空间结构、规范理论对应和可积系统。

title: Stable envelopes for critical loci
summary: This is the first in a sequence of papers devoted to stable envelopes in critical cohomology and critical $K$-theory for symmetric GIT quotients with potentials and related geometries, and their applications to geometric representation theory and enumerative geometry. In this paper, we construct critical stable envelopes and establish their general properties, including compatibility with dimensional reductions, specializations, Hall products, and other geometric constructions. In particular, for tripled quivers with canonical cubic potentials, the critical stable envelopes reproduce those on Nakajima quiver varieties. These set up foundations for applications in subsequent papers.

AI.tldr: 本文是系列论文的第一篇，构建了对称GIT商空间临界上同调与K理论中的稳定包络，并建立了其基本性质，为后续应用奠定基础。
AI.motivation: 研究对称几何不变理论(GIT)商空间在临界上同调和临界K理论中的稳定包络结构，旨在为几何表示论和枚举几何提供理论基础。
AI.method: 构造临界稳定包络，并证明其与维度约化、特殊化、Hall乘积及其他几何构造的兼容性。特别地，对于具有典型三次势的三重箭图，临界稳定包络再现了中岛箭图簇上的稳定包络。
AI.result: 成功构建了临界稳定包络理论框架，建立了其基本性质，为后续在几何表示论和枚举几何中的应用奠定了基础。
AI.conclusion: 本文建立了临界稳定包络的完整理论框架，为后续系列论文中的应用研究提供了坚实的数学基础。

title: Moduli of surfaces fibered in (log) Calabi-Yau pairs II: elliptic surfaces
comment: 29 pages, 3 figures and 2 tables; comments are welcome
summary:
This paper continues the study initiated in [ISZ25] on the moduli of surfaces admitting lc-trivial fibrations. Using the techniques developed in [ISZ25], we
  (1) provide a classification of the surfaces appearing on the boundary of the KSBA-moduli space of elliptic surfaces with a bisection
  (2) recover the results of a series of papers on the moduli stacks of elliptic surfaces with a section [AB22, Inc20, Bru15].
  Notably, our proof of (2) avoids the use of explicit steps of an MMP, such as the "La Nave flip" from [LN02], which plays a central role in [AB22,Inc20].

AI.tldr: 本文延续[ISZ25]研究，利用其技术：(1)分类椭圆曲面双截线KSBA模空间边界曲面；(2)恢复椭圆曲面带截面模叠的一系列结果，且证明避免了显式MMP步骤。
AI.motivation: 继续研究具有lc-平凡纤维化的曲面模空间，特别是椭圆曲面的模空间。旨在提供更简洁的证明方法，避免复杂的极小模型程序步骤。
AI.method: 采用[ISZ25]中发展的技术，研究KSBA模空间边界曲面分类。通过新方法避免使用显式MMP步骤，如"La Nave flip"等复杂操作。
AI.result: (1)完成了椭圆曲面带双截线的KSBA模空间边界曲面的分类；(2)恢复了椭圆曲面带截面模叠的已有结果，且证明更加简洁。
AI.conclusion: 本文提供了一种更简洁的方法来研究椭圆曲面模空间，避免了复杂的MMP技术，为相关模空间研究提供了新视角。

title: Push-forward of smooth measures and strong Thom stratifications
summary: We study the collection of measures obtained via push-forward along a map between smooth varieties over p-adic fields. We investigate when the stalks of this collection are finite-dimensional. We provide an algebro-geometric criterion ensuring this property. This criterion is formulated in terms of a canonical subvariety of the cotangent bundle of the source of the map.

AI.tldr: 研究p-adic域上光滑簇之间映射的推前测度集合，分析其茎的有限维性条件，给出代数几何判据
AI.motivation: 研究p-adic域上光滑簇之间映射的推前测度集合的有限维性，这在p-adic几何和表示论中有重要应用
AI.method: 通过映射的推前构造测度集合，利用源簇余切丛的典范子簇作为代数几何判据
AI.result: 建立了确保推前测度集合茎为有限维的代数几何判据，该判据基于源簇余切丛的特定子簇
AI.conclusion: 成功给出了p-adic域上光滑簇映射推前测度集合有限维性的代数几何特征化条件

title: Rank three representations of Painlevé systems: II. de Rham structure, Fourier--Laplace transformation
summary: We use formal microlocalization to describe the Fourier--Laplace transformation between rank 3 and rank 2 D-module representations of Painleve systems. We conclude the existence of biregular morphism between the corresponding de Rham complex structures.

AI.tldr: 使用形式微局部分析描述Painlevé系统的秩3和秩2 D-模表示之间的傅里叶-拉普拉斯变换，并证明相应de Rham复形结构之间存在双正则态射。
AI.motivation: 研究Painlevé系统的不同秩D-模表示之间的变换关系，特别是傅里叶-拉普拉斯变换，以理解这些表示之间的几何联系。
AI.method: 采用形式微局部分析方法，分析Painlevé系统的秩3和秩2 D-模表示之间的傅里叶-拉普拉斯变换。
AI.result: 证明了相应de Rham复形结构之间存在双正则态射，建立了不同秩表示之间的几何对应关系。
AI.conclusion: 形式微局部分析为研究Painlevé系统的D-模表示变换提供了有效工具，揭示了不同秩表示之间的深刻几何联系。

title: Admissible HYM metrics on klt KE varieties and the MY equality for big anticanonical K-stable varieties
summary: This short note includes three results: $(1)$ If a reflexive sheaf $\mathcal{E}$ on a log terminal Kähler-Einstein variety $(X,ω)$ is slope stable with respect to a singular Kähler-Einstein metric $ω$, then $\mathcal{E}$ admits an $ω$-admissible Hermitian-Yang-Mills metric. $(2)$ If a K-stable log terminal projective variety with big anti-canonical divisor satisfies the equality of the Miyaoka-Yau inequality in the sense of \cite{IJZ25}, then its anti-canonical model admits a quasi-étale cover from $\mathbb{C}P^n$. $(3)$ There exists a holomorphic rank 3 vector bundle on a compact complex surface which is semistable for some nef and big line bundle, but it is not semistable for any ample line bundles.

AI.tldr: 本文包含三个结果：1) 在log terminal Kähler-Einstein簇上，关于奇异Kähler-Einstein度量斜率稳定的自反层存在Hermitian-Yang-Mills度量；2) 满足Miyaoka-Yau等式等式的K-稳定簇，其反典范模型有来自CP^n的拟étale覆盖；3) 存在在某个nef且大的线丛上半稳定但在任何丰富线丛上不半稳定的全纯秩3向量丛。
AI.motivation: 研究代数几何与复几何中的稳定性条件与度量结构之间的关系，特别是探讨在奇异Kähler-Einstein度量下的稳定性与Hermitian-Yang-Mills度量的存在性，以及K-稳定性与几何结构的关系。
AI.method: 采用复几何和代数几何的方法，结合奇异Kähler-Einstein度量理论、稳定性条件和覆盖空间理论，通过构造性证明和理论分析来建立结果。
AI.result: 1) 证明了在log terminal Kähler-Einstein簇上，关于奇异Kähler-Einstein度量斜率稳定的自反层存在ω-容许的Hermitian-Yang-Mills度量；2) 证明了满足特定条件的K-稳定簇的反典范模型有来自CP^n的拟étale覆盖；3) 构造了一个在nef且大线丛上半稳定但在任何丰富线丛上不半稳定的秩3向量丛。
AI.conclusion: 本文建立了奇异Kähler-Einstein度量下稳定性与Hermitian-Yang-Mills度量的对应关系，揭示了K-稳定性与几何覆盖结构之间的联系，并展示了稳定性条件对线丛选择的敏感性，为复几何和代数几何中的稳定性理论提供了新的见解。

title: On the 1-leg Donaldson-Thomas $\mathbb{Z}_2\times\mathbb{Z}_2$-vertex
summary: We introduce a notion of restricted pyramid configurations for computing the 1-leg Donaldson-Thomas $\mathbb{Z}_2\times\mathbb{Z}_2$-vertex. We study a special type of restricted pyramid configurations with the prescribed 1-leg partitions, and find one unique class of them satisfying the symmetric interlacing property. This leads us to obtain an explicit formula for a class of 1-leg Donaldson-Thomas $\mathbb{Z}_2\times\mathbb{Z}_2$-vertex through establishing its connection with 1-leg Donaldson-Thomas $\mathbb{Z}_4$-vertex using the vertex operator methods of Okounkov-Reshetikhin-Vafa and Bryan-Young.

AI.tldr: 提出受限金字塔配置概念计算1-leg Donaldson-Thomas Z2×Z2顶点，找到满足对称交错性质的唯一配置类，通过顶点算子方法建立与Z4顶点的联系并获得显式公式
AI.motivation: 研究Donaldson-Thomas理论中的顶点不变量，特别是具有Z2×Z2对称性的1-leg顶点，旨在找到计算这类顶点的新方法和显式表达式
AI.method: 引入受限金字塔配置概念，研究具有指定1-leg分划的特殊类型配置，寻找满足对称交错性质的配置类，使用Okounkov-Reshetikhin-Vafa和Bryan-Young的顶点算子方法建立Z2×Z2顶点与Z4顶点之间的联系
AI.result: 找到了一类满足对称交错性质的唯一受限金字塔配置，通过建立与1-leg Donaldson-Thomas Z4顶点的联系，获得了1-leg Donaldson-Thomas Z2×Z2顶点的显式公式
AI.conclusion: 受限金字塔配置为计算Donaldson-Thomas顶点提供了有效框架，通过对称交错性质和顶点算子方法，成功推导出Z2×Z2顶点的显式表达式，为相关几何不变量计算提供了新工具

title: Geometric Eisenstein series in non-abelian Hodge theory and hyperholomorphic branes from supersymmetry
summary: Using geometric Eisenstein series, foundational work of Arinkin and Gaitsgory constructs cuspidal-Eisenstein decompositions for ind-coherent nilpotent sheaves on the de Rham moduli of local systems. This article extends these constructions to coherent (not ind-coherent) nilpotent sheaves on the Dolbeault, Hodge and twistor moduli from non-abelian Hodge theory. We thus account for Higgs bundles, Hodge filtrations and hyperkähler rotations of local systems. In particular, our constructions are shown to decompose a hyperholomorphic sheaf theory of so-called BBB-branes into cuspidal and Eisenstein components. Our work is motivated, on the one hand, by the `classical limit' or `Dolbeault geometric Langlands conjecture' of Donagi and Pantev, and on the other, by attempts to interpret Kapustin and Witten's physical duality between BBB-branes and BAA-branes in 4D supersymmetric Yang--Mills theories as a mathematical statement within the geometric Langlands program.

AI.tldr: 该论文将Arinkin和Gaitsgory的几何Eisenstein级数构造从de Rham模空间扩展到Dolbeault、Hodge和twistor模空间，为Higgs丛、Hodge滤过和局部系统的超Kähler旋转提供了cuspidal-Eisenstein分解。
AI.motivation: 动机来自两个方面：一是Donagi和Pantev提出的"经典极限"或"Dolbeault几何Langlands猜想"；二是试图将Kapustin和Witten在4D超对称Yang-Mills理论中提出的BBB-膜与BAA-膜之间的物理对偶性解释为几何Langlands纲领中的数学陈述。
AI.method: 使用几何Eisenstein级数，将Arinkin和Gaitsgory的构造从de Rham模空间的ind-coherent幂零层扩展到Dolbeault、Hodge和twistor模空间的coherent幂零层，从而处理非阿贝尔Hodge理论中的Higgs丛、Hodge滤过和局部系统的超Kähler旋转。
AI.result: 成功构造了超全纯层理论（所谓的BBB-膜）的cuspidal和Eisenstein分量分解，为Dolbeault几何Langlands猜想和物理对偶性提供了数学框架。
AI.conclusion: 该工作将几何Langlands纲领中的cuspidal-Eisenstein分解构造扩展到非阿贝尔Hodge理论的各种模空间，为理解Dolbeault几何Langlands猜想和Kapustin-Witten物理对偶性提供了重要数学工具。

title: Proper moduli spaces of orthosymplectic complexes
summary: We apply the formalism of Alper-Halpern-Leistner-Heinloth to construct proper good moduli spaces for moduli stacks of Bridgeland semistable orthosymplectic complexes on a complex smooth projective variety, which we propose as a candidate for compactifying moduli spaces of principal bundles for the orthogonal and symplectic groups. We also prove some results on good moduli spaces of fixed point stacks and mapping stacks from finite groupoids.

AI.tldr: 构建正交辛复形Bridgeland半稳定模栈的proper good moduli spaces，作为正交和辛群主丛模空间紧化的候选
AI.motivation: 为正交群和辛群的主丛模空间寻找紧化方案，利用Bridgeland稳定性条件处理正交辛复形
AI.method: 应用Alper-Halpern-Leistner-Heinloth形式体系，构造Bridgeland半稳定正交辛复形模栈的proper good moduli spaces，并研究不动点栈和有限群胚映射栈的good moduli spaces
AI.result: 成功构造了正交辛复形模栈的proper good moduli spaces，证明了关于不动点栈和有限群胚映射栈的good moduli spaces的一些结果
AI.conclusion: 提出的构造为紧化正交和辛群主丛模空间提供了有前景的候选方案，相关技术结果对模空间理论有更广泛的应用价值

title: Tropical methods for building real space sextics with totally real tritangent planes
summary:
This paper proposes the use of combinatorial techniques from tropical geometry to build the 120 tritangent planes to a given smooth algebraic space sextic. Although the tropical count is infinite, tropical tritangents come in 15 equivalence classes, each containing the tropicalization of exactly eight classical tritangents.
  Under mild genericity conditions on the tropical side, we show that liftings of tropical tritangents are defined over quadratic extensions of the ground field over which the input sextic curve is defined. When the input curve is real, we prove that every complex liftable member of a given tropical tritangent class either completely lifts to the reals or none of its liftings are defined over the reals. As our main application we use these methods to build examples of real space sextics with 64 and 120 totally real tritangents, respectively. The paper concludes with a discussion of our results in the arithmetic setting.

AI.tldr: 利用热带几何的组合技术构建空间六次曲线的120个三重切平面，热带计数无限但可分为15个等价类，每类对应8个经典三重切平面。在热带侧温和条件下，热带三重切平面的提升在二次扩张上定义。对于实曲线，证明每个热带类要么完全提升到实数域，要么没有实数提升。应用：构建具有64和120个全实三重切平面的实空间六次曲线。
AI.motivation: 研究空间六次曲线的三重切平面问题，特别是如何利用热带几何的组合方法来系统地构建和分类这些平面。传统方法处理120个三重切平面较为复杂，热带几何提供了一种更结构化的分析框架。
AI.method: 采用热带几何的组合技术，将无限的热带三重切平面分为15个等价类，每类对应8个经典三重切平面。在热带侧施加温和的泛型条件，分析提升的性质。特别关注实数域的情况，研究热带类到实数域的提升行为。
AI.result: 1) 热带三重切平面可分为15个等价类，每类包含恰好8个经典三重切平面的热带化；2) 在温和条件下，热带三重切平面的提升在二次扩张上定义；3) 对于实曲线，每个热带类要么所有提升都是实数，要么没有实数提升；4) 构建了具有64和120个全实三重切平面的实空间六次曲线实例。
AI.conclusion: 热带几何为研究空间六次曲线的三重切平面提供了有效的组合框架，能够系统分类和构建这些平面。方法不仅适用于复数域，还能处理实数域的情况，并可用于构造具有特定实数性质的曲线实例。结果在算术几何中也有应用价值。

title: The period map from commutative to noncommutative deformations
summary: We study the period map from infinitesimal deformations of a scheme $X$ over a perfect field $k$ to those of the associated $k$-linear $\infty$-category $\mathrm{QC}(X)$. For quasicompact, smooth, and separated $X$, we identify the corresponding map on tangent fibres with the dual HKR map $\mathrm{R}Γ(X, \mathrm{T}_X)[1] \to \mathrm{HH}^{\bullet}(X/k)[2]$, and give conditions for injectivity on homotopy groups. As applications, we prove liftability along square-zero extensions to be a derived invariant (at least when $\mathrm{char}(k) \ne 2$), and exhibit cases where the entire (classical) deformation functor of $X$ is a derived invariant; this partially answers a question of Lieblich.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了从概形X的无穷小形变到其关联∞-范畴QC(X)形变的周期映射，证明了在特定条件下该映射与对偶HKR映射一致，并给出了提升性作为导出不变量的结果。
AI.motivation: 研究概形X的经典形变与其导出范畴QC(X)形变之间的关系，特别是理解周期映射的性质，以及何时经典形变函子是导出不变量，这回答了Lieblich提出的问题。
AI.method: 通过分析从X的无穷小形变到QC(X)形变的周期映射，识别该映射在切纤维上与对偶HKR映射的一致性，并给出同伦群上单射性的条件。
AI.result: 证明了在拟紧、光滑、分离的X上，周期映射的切纤维映射与对偶HKR映射一致；给出了提升性沿平方零扩张是导出不变量的结果（当char(k)≠2时）；展示了经典形变函子完全成为导出不变量的情况。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了经典几何形变与导出范畴形变之间的深刻联系，证明了提升性作为导出不变量的性质，并部分回答了Lieblich关于经典形变函子何时是导出不变量的问题。

title: Topology, Hyperbolicity, and the Shafarevich Conjecture for Complex Algebraic Varieties
summary: This survey presents recent developments concerning the Shafarevich conjecture, non-abelian Hodge theories, hyperbolicity, and the topology of complex algebraic varieties, as well as the interplay among these areas. More precisely, we present the main ideas and techniques involved in the linear versions of the following conjectures: the Shafarevich conjecture, the Chern-Hopf-Thurston conjecture, Kollár's conjecture on the holomorphic Euler characteristic, the de Oliveira-Katzarkov-Ramachandran conjecture, and Campana's nilpotency conjecture. In addition, we discuss characterizations of the hyperbolicity of complex quasi-projective varieties via representations of their fundamental groups, together with the generalized Green-Griffiths-Lang conjecture in the presence of a big local system.

AI.tldr: 该综述介绍了Shafarevich猜想、非阿贝尔Hodge理论、双曲性、复代数簇拓扑等领域的最新进展，重点讨论了这些猜想在线性版本下的主要思想和技术。
AI.motivation: 整合并展示Shafarevich猜想、非阿贝尔Hodge理论、双曲性和复代数簇拓扑等领域的相互联系和最新发展，为相关研究提供系统性的综述。
AI.method: 采用综述性方法，系统介绍多个猜想（Shafarevich猜想、Chern-Hopf-Thurston猜想、Kollár猜想、de Oliveira-Katzarkov-Ramachandran猜想、Campana幂零猜想）在线性版本下的主要思想和技术，并讨论通过基本群表示来刻画复拟射影簇双曲性的方法。
AI.result: 提供了这些猜想在线性框架下的统一视角，展示了通过基本群表示刻画双曲性的新方法，以及在存在大局部系统时的广义Green-Griffiths-Lang猜想。
AI.conclusion: 该综述系统梳理了复代数几何中多个重要猜想的最新进展和相互联系，为理解Shafarevich猜想、双曲性理论和代数簇拓扑之间的关系提供了综合视角，推动了这些领域的交叉研究。

title: Poincaré duality for singular tropical hypersurfaces
summary: We find a partial extension of Poincaré duality theorem of Jell-Rau-Shaw to hypersurfaces obtained by non-primitive Viro's combinatorial patchworking. We define a classification of the triangulations of a lattice polytope by a level of primitivity and we find a partial Poincaré duality for patchworkings depending on the level of primitivity of the triangulation. Our notion of primitivity is defined modulo a certain integral domain, it is weaker than the classical definition of primitivity. We obtain also a generalization of the complete Poincaré duality over a certain integral domain to hypersurfaces obtained by patchworkings which are primitive modulo this integral domain. In particular, our corollary is that any tropical hypersurface obtained by patchworking from a triangulation of a simple lattice polytope satisfies complete Poincaré duality over the field of rationals, which is a converse of a theorem of Aksnes.

AI.tldr: 该论文将Poincaré对偶定理部分扩展到由非原始Viro组合拼贴构造的超曲面，通过定义格点多面体三角剖分的原始性级别，建立了依赖于三角剖分原始性级别的部分Poincaré对偶性。
AI.motivation: 扩展Jell-Rau-Shaw的Poincaré对偶定理到更一般的超曲面构造，特别是由非原始Viro组合拼贴方法构造的超曲面，建立更广泛的对偶性理论。
AI.method: 定义格点多面体三角剖分的原始性级别（模某个整环），研究拼贴构造超曲面的Poincaré对偶性，证明其依赖于三角剖分的原始性级别。
AI.result: 获得了部分Poincaré对偶定理，对于模特定整域原始的拼贴构造，建立了完全Poincaré对偶性。特别地，证明了由简单格点多面体三角剖分通过拼贴构造的任何热带超曲面在有理数域上满足完全Poincaré对偶。
AI.conclusion: 该工作扩展了Poincaré对偶定理的应用范围，建立了拼贴构造超曲面对偶性与三角剖分原始性级别的关系，并得到了Aksnes定理的逆命题。

title: Strict germs on normal surface singularities
summary: We show that any holomorphic germ $f \colon (X,x_0) \to (Y,y_0)$ of topological degree $1$ between normal surface singularities can be written as $f=π\circ σ$, where $π\colon Y' \to (Y,y_0)$ is a modification and $σ\colon (X,x_0) \to (Y',y_1)$ is a local isomorphism sending $x_0$ to a point $y_1 \in π^{-1}(y_0)$. A result by Fantini, Favre and myself guarantees that when $f$ is a selfmap, then $(X,x_0)$ is a sandwiched singularity. We give here an alternative proof based on the construction of the associated Kato surfaces, and valuative dynamics.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了任意拓扑度为1的正规曲面奇点间的全纯芽可以分解为修改映射和局部同构的复合，并给出了自映射情况下奇点性质的替代证明。
AI.motivation: 研究正规曲面奇点间全纯芽的结构分解问题，特别是拓扑度为1的情况，为理解奇点间的映射关系提供理论框架。
AI.method: 采用修改映射和局部同构的分解方法，结合Kato曲面的构造和赋值动力学技术，为自映射情况提供替代证明。
AI.result: 证明了任意拓扑度为1的正规曲面奇点间的全纯芽可以分解为修改映射和局部同构的复合，当映射为自映射时，源奇点是夹心奇点。
AI.conclusion: 该分解定理为正规曲面奇点间的全纯映射提供了结构理解，Kato曲面和赋值动力学的应用为自映射情况提供了新的证明视角。

title: On $\mathscr{M}$-arrangements of conics and lines with ordinary singularities
summary: In this paper, we study combinatorial aspects of reduced plane curves known as $\mathscr{M}$-curves. This notation is a natural generalization of maximizing plane curves which are well-known in the theory of algebraic surfaces. We focus here on $\mathscr{M}$-arrangements of conics and lines with ordinary singularities of multiplicity less than five and we provide various numerical constraints on their existence, particularly in terms of their weak combinatorics. Moreover, we study in detail the scenario when our $\mathscr{M}$-arrangements consist of lines and just one conic.

AI.tldr: 研究具有普通奇点（重数小于5）的M-曲线组合性质，特别关注由直线和一个圆锥曲线构成的M-排列
AI.motivation: M-曲线是最大化平面曲线的自然推广，在代数曲面理论中具有重要意义。研究这类曲线的组合性质有助于理解代数曲面的结构特征
AI.method: 研究具有普通奇点（重数小于5）的圆锥曲线和直线的M-排列，提供其存在的数值约束条件，特别详细分析仅包含直线和一个圆锥曲线的M-排列情况
AI.result: 获得了M-排列存在的各种数值约束条件，特别是在弱组合意义下的约束，详细描述了仅包含直线和一个圆锥曲线的M-排列的具体情况
AI.conclusion: M-曲线组合性质的研究为理解代数曲面提供了新的视角，特别是对于由直线和圆锥曲线构成的M-排列，获得了具体的数值约束和存在条件

title: Generalised Hermite-Einstein Fibre Metrics and Slope Stability for Holomorphic Vector Bundles
summary: Let $X$ be a compact complex manifold of dimension $n$ and let $m$ be a positive integer with $m\leq n$. Assume that $X$ admits a Kähler metric $ω$ and a weakly positive, $\partial\bar\partial$-closed, smooth $(n-m,\,n-m)$-form $Ω$. We introduce the notions of $(ω,\,Ω)$-Hermite-Einstein holomorphic vector bundles and $(ω,\,Ω)$(-semi)-stable coherent sheaves on $X$ by generalising the classical definitions depending only on $ω$. We then prove that the $(ω,\,Ω)$-Hermite-Einstein condition implies the $(ω,\,Ω)$-semi-stability of a holomorphic vector bundle and its splitting into $(ω,\,Ω)$-stable subbundles. This extends a classical result by Kobayashi and Lübke to our generalised setting.

AI.tldr: 该论文将经典的Hermite-Einstein度量和稳定性理论推广到包含额外$(n-m,n-m)$-形式Ω的广义设置，证明了$(ω,Ω)$-Hermite-Einstein条件蕴含$(ω,Ω)$-半稳定性，并得到向量丛分裂为$(ω,Ω)$-稳定子丛的结果。
AI.motivation: 经典Kobayashi-Lübke理论仅依赖于Kähler度量ω，本文旨在将Hermite-Einstein度量和稳定性理论推广到包含额外$(n-m,n-m)$-形式Ω的更一般设置，建立更广泛的几何框架。
AI.method: 引入$(ω,Ω)$-Hermite-Einstein全纯向量丛和$(ω,Ω)$(-半)稳定凝聚层的概念，通过推广经典定义，在包含额外$(n-m,n-m)$-形式Ω的广义设置下建立相应理论。
AI.result: 证明了$(ω,Ω)$-Hermite-Einstein条件蕴含$(ω,Ω)$-半稳定性，并且全纯向量丛可以分裂为$(ω,Ω)$-稳定子丛，这是Kobayashi-Lübke经典结果的推广。
AI.conclusion: 成功将经典的Hermite-Einstein和稳定性理论推广到包含额外$(n-m,n-m)$-形式Ω的广义几何设置，为相关几何研究提供了更丰富的理论框架。

title: Cartier duality for gerbes of vector bundles
summary: We prove a Cartier duality for gerbes of algebraic and analytic vector bundles as an anti-equivalence of Hopf algebras in the category of kernels of analytic stacks. As an application, we prove that the category of solid quasi-coherent sheaves on the Hodge-Tate stack of a smooth rigid variety over an algebraically closed field $C$ of mixed characteristic $(0,p)$ is equivalent to the category of weight $1$ sheaves on Bhatt-Zhang's Simpson gerbe.

AI.tldr: 证明了代数与解析向量丛gerbes的Cartier对偶性，并应用于刚性簇上Hodge-Tate栈的拟凝聚层范畴与Simpson gerbe上权1层范畴的等价性
AI.motivation: 研究代数与解析向量丛gerbes的Cartier对偶理论，并将其应用于混合特征刚性簇的Hodge-Tate几何与Simpson几何的联系
AI.method: 证明代数与解析向量丛gerbes的Cartier对偶作为解析栈核范畴中Hopf代数的反等价，然后应用于Hodge-Tate栈的固体拟凝聚层范畴
AI.result: 建立了gerbes的Cartier对偶定理，并证明了混合特征光滑刚性簇的Hodge-Tate栈的固体拟凝聚层范畴与Bhatt-Zhang的Simpson gerbe上权1层范畴等价
AI.conclusion: Cartier对偶为gerbes理论提供了新工具，揭示了Hodge-Tate几何与Simpson几何之间的深刻联系，为混合特征几何研究开辟了新方向

title: Mod $p$ Poincaré duality for $p$-adic period domains
summary: In this article, we introduce a new class of smooth partially proper rigid analytic varieties over a $p$-adic field that satisfy Poincaré duality for étale cohomology with mod $p$-coefficients : the varieties satisfying "primitive comparison with compact support". We show that almost proper varieties, as well as p-adic (weakly admissible) period domains in the sense of Rappoport-Zink belong to this class. In particular, we recover Poincaré duality for almost proper varieties as first established by Li-Reinecke-Zavyalov, and we compute the étale cohomology with $\mathbb{F}_p$-coefficients of p-adic period domains, generalizing a computation of Colmez-Dospinescu-Niziol for Drinfeld's symmetric spaces. The arguments used in this paper rely crucially on Mann's six functors formalism for solid $\mathcal{O}^{+,a}/π$ coefficients.

AI.tldr: 本文引入了一类新的光滑部分真刚性解析簇，满足带紧支集的étale上同调的庞加莱对偶性，称为"带紧支集的原始比较"簇。证明了几乎真簇和p-adic周期域属于此类，从而恢复了Li-Reinecke-Zavyalov的庞加莱对偶性，并计算了p-adic周期域的étale上同调。
AI.motivation: 研究p-adic域上满足庞加莱对偶性的刚性解析簇，特别是为几乎真簇和p-adic周期域建立étale上同调的庞加莱对偶性，并计算周期域的上同调群。
AI.method: 引入"带紧支集的原始比较"簇的新概念，利用Mann的六函子形式体系处理固体系数$\mathcal{O}^{+,a}/π$，证明几乎真簇和p-adic周期域属于此类。
AI.result: 1. 建立了几乎真簇的庞加莱对偶性（恢复Li-Reinecke-Zavyalov结果）；2. 计算了p-adic周期域的$\mathbb{F}_p$-系数étale上同调，推广了Colmez-Dospinescu-Niziol对Drinfeld对称空间的计算。
AI.conclusion: "带紧支集的原始比较"簇为研究p-adic刚性解析几何中的庞加莱对偶性提供了统一框架，将几乎真簇和周期域纳入其中，并利用固体系数理论获得了上同调计算的新结果。

title: The Hochschild homology of a noncommutative symmetric quotient stack
summary: We prove an orbifold type decomposition theorem for the Hochschild homology of the symmetric powers of a small DG category $\mathcal{A}$. In noncommutative geometry, these can be viewed as the noncommutative symmetric quotient stacks of $\mathcal{A}$. We use this decomposition to show that the total Hochschild homology of the symmetric powers of $\mathcal{A}$ is isomorphic to the symmetric algebra $S^*(\mathrm{HH}_\bullet(\mathcal{A}) \otimes t \mathbb{k}[t])$. Our methods are explicit - we construct mutually inverse homotopy equivalences of the standard Hochschild complexes involved. These explicit maps are then used to induce from the symmetric algebra onto the total Hochschild homology the structures of the Fock space for the Heisenberg algebra of $\mathcal{A}$, of a Hopf algebra, and of a free $λ$-ring generated by $\mathrm{HH}_\bullet(\mathcal{A})$.

AI.tldr: 本文证明了对称幂的Hochschild同调具有轨道分解定理，并建立了与对称代数的同构关系，构造了显式的同伦等价映射。
AI.motivation: 研究小DG范畴对称幂的Hochschild同调结构，在非交换几何中将其视为非交换对称商栈，旨在建立其与对称代数的关系并揭示代数结构。
AI.method: 构造了标准Hochschild复形之间的互逆同伦等价映射，使用显式方法证明分解定理，并利用这些映射诱导代数结构。
AI.result: 证明了对称幂的总Hochschild同调与对称代数同构，并诱导出Heisenberg代数的Fock空间结构、Hopf代数结构和自由λ-环结构。
AI.conclusion: 建立了小DG范畴对称幂Hochschild同调的完整代数结构理论，为理解非交换对称商栈提供了新的数学工具和视角。
